TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider extends System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider

summary.span: 为 Active Directory 和 Active Directory 应用程序模式服务器中的 ASP.NET 应用程序管理成员资格信息的存储。

span.span: Manages storage of membership information for an ASP.NET application in Active Directory and Active Directory Application Mode servers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此类由和类提供成员资格服务 ASP.NET 应用程序，请使用 Active Directory (AD) 或 Active Directory 应用程序模式 (ADAM) 服务器。This class is used by the and classes to provide membership services for an ASP.NET application using an Active Directory (AD) or Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) server. > [!NOTE] > 使用 ADAM 服务器需要特定的配置。Using an ADAM server requires specific configuration. 有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 ADAM 配置节。For more information, see the ADAM Configuration section below. > [!IMPORTANT] > 实例只适用于 ASP.NET 的完全信任策略默认配置。The instance works only in the full-trust policy default configuration of ASP.NET. 若要使用实例任一部分信任级别，你必须针对你的应用程序对适当的信任策略文件进行更改或者必须在 GAC 中创建的"沙盒"程序集的部署。In order to use the instance at any partial-trust level, either you must make changes to the appropriate trust policy file for your application or you must create a "sandbox" assembly that is deployed in the GAC. > > 类要求不受限制的运行的权限。The class requires unrestricted permission to run. 此权限不会添加到任何使用 ASP.NET 提供的部分信任策略文件。This permission is not added to any of the partial-trust policy files supplied with ASP.NET. 尽管添加对部分信任策略文件的权限将允许使用类，这样也使命名空间类可用于在 ASP.NET 页中运行的任意代码。Although adding the permission to a partial-trust policy file will enable use of the class, doing so makes the namespace classes available to any code running in your ASP.NET pages. 此选项不建议用于任何需要在一种安全的锁定模式中运行的 Web 服务器。This option is not recommended for any Web servers that need to run in a secure, locked-down mode. > > 作为替代方法，你可以创建一个"沙盒"程序集调用类。As an alternative, you can create a "sandbox" assembly that calls the class. 此程序集可以包含其中一个将转发到的方法调用的包装类类或派生自类类。This assembly can contain either a wrapper class that forwards method calls to the class or a class that derives from the class. 在任一情况下，包装器类必须声明不受限制权限。In either case, the wrapper class must assert unrestricted permission. 部署位于 GAC 中的沙盒程序集并将磁带标记为程序集(APTCA) 特性。Deploy the sandbox assembly in the GAC and mark the assembly with the (APTCA) attribute. 这将使你部分受信任的 ASP.NET 代码，即可调用包装器类，并且自包装类在内部断言不受限制权限，包装器类将为能够成功调用提供程序This will enable your partially trusted ASP.NET code to call your wrapper class, and since the wrapper class internally asserts the unrestricted permission, your wrapper class will be able to successfully call the provider 你必须创建[connectionStrings 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) Web.config 文件中标识的 Active Directory 服务器、 Active Directory 域或要使用的 ADAM 应用程序分区中的条目。You must create a [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) entry in the Web.config file that identifies the Active Directory server, Active Directory domain, or ADAM application partition to use. 在域作用域，或在范围之内域，将仅运行提供程序。The provider will only operate at domain scope, or in a subscope within a domain. 下表列出了允许的连接字符串和使用的范围。The following table lists allowed connection strings and the scope used. |连接字符串Connection string|范围Scope| |-----------------------|-----------| |LDAP: / /\<域或服务器 >: [端口]LDAP://\:[port]

端口号是可选的 ADAM 和 Active Directory 时不需要。Port number is optional for ADAM and not needed for Active Directory.|针对指定的域或服务器运行提供程序。The provider runs against the specified domain or server. 与 AD，用户创建和删除已完成的默认用户容器中。With AD, user creation and deletion is done in the default users container. 所有其他操作，包括任何搜索方法中，将某个位于默认命名上下文中，为域中。All other operations, including any search methods, will be rooted at the default naming context for the domain.

如果连接字符串指定的 Active Directory 域而不是特定服务器和属性是`true`、实例将始终连接到具有要确保该密码的域的 PDC 角色的服务器更改生效，并且可用调用方法。If the connection string specifies an Active Directory domain rather than a specific server and the property is `true`, the instance will always connect to the server with the PDC role for the domain to ensure that password changes take effect and are available when the method is called.

此连接字符串时不允许使用 ADAM，并且会在引发。This connection string is not allowed when using ADAM, and will throw a .| |LDAP: / /\<域或服务器 >: [端口] /\<容器 dn >LDAP://\:[port]/\

端口号是可选的 ADAM 和 Active Directory 时不需要。Port number is optional for ADAM and not needed for Active Directory.|针对指定的域或服务器运行提供程序。The provider runs against the specified domain or server. 用户创建和删除仅在指定的容器中完成。User creation and deletion is only done in the specified container. 所有其他操作，包括任何搜索方法中，执行在容器取得 root 权限的子树搜索。All other operations, including any search methods, perform subtree searches rooted at the container.

对于 ADAM 服务器，该容器指定应用程序分区或应用程序分区中的容器的根目录。For ADAM servers, the container specifies the root of an application partition, or a container within an application partition.

我们建议的连接字符串定义特定容器，以便提高性能。We recommend that the connection string define a specific container to improve performance.| 实例映射到的目录属性属性。The instance maps directory attributes to properties. 如果没有属性映射在 Web.config 文件中完成，则使用默认属性。Default attributes are used if no attribute mapping is done in the Web.config file. 属性映射的详细信息，请参阅中的各个属性类文档。For more information on attribute mappings, see the individual properties in the class documentation. 下表列出属性及其默认特性映射。The following table lists the properties and their default attribute mappings. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类不显式检查提供程序属性将不映射到目录中的用户对象的核心属性。The class does not explicitly check that provider attributes are not mapped to core attributes of the user object in the directory. 你必须确保该目录中的敏感信息不公开可通过映射特性。You must ensure that sensitive information from the directory is not exposed through mapped attributes. |PropertyProperty|默认目录属性Default directory attribute|可以映射？Can be mapped?| |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| ||securityIdentifiersecurityIdentifier|否No| ||userPrincipalNameuserPrincipalName|是，但必须 userPrincipalName 或 sAMAccountNameYes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName| ||注释comment|否No| ||whenCreatedwhenCreated|否No| ||邮件mail|是，但必须是 Unicode String 类型的单值属性。Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| ||n/an/a|不支持。Not supported by .| ||n/an/a|不支持。Not supported by .| ||pwdLastSetpwdLastSet|否No| ||无none|是，但必须是 Unicode String 类型的单值属性。Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| ||用户帐户控制 (AD)User-Account-Control (AD)

mDS UserAccountDisabled (ADAM)mDS-UserAccountDisabled (ADAM)|否No| ||计算从 'lockouttime' 和 AD 锁定持续时间 (在 Windows 2000 上的 AD)computed from lockoutTime and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)

msDS 用户的帐户的控件的计算 (AD 在 Windows Server 2003)msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed (AD on Windows Server 2003)

msDS 用户的帐户的控件的计算 (ADAM)msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed (ADAM)|否No| ||如果由于尝试输入太多次不正确的密码，用户被锁定，则返回锁定时间属性。If user is locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.

如果用户锁定由于过多错误密码答案尝试，通过定义的特性中存储的值`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime`返回。If user is locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.

如果用户锁定由于密码错误并尝试输入太多次不正确的密码、 最新的日期/时间值返回。If user is locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.

如果帐户未锁定，则返回 1/1/1754，以便与 SQL 兼容性。If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1754 for SQL compatibility.|否No| 当同时和属性`true`、类支持密码重置安全通过要求用户在回答预先确定的问题。When both the and properties are `true`, the class supports password-reset security by requiring the user to answer a predetermined question. 若要支持问题和答案，你必须设置以下配置属性使用[将元素添加为成员资格 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18)应用程序配置文件中。To support the question and answer, you must set the following configuration attributes using the [add Element for providers for membership (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18) in the application configuration file. |配置属性Configuration attribute|特性类型Attribute type| |-----------------------------|--------------------| |`attributeMapPasswordQuestion`|必须是 Unicode String 类型的单值属性。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |`attributeMapPasswordAnswer`|必须是 Unicode String 类型的单值属性。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`|必须是整数类型的单值属性。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Integer.| |`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`|必须是类型大的整数间隔的单值属性。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Large Integer/Interval.| |`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime`|必须是类型大的整数间隔的单值属性。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Large Integer/Interval.| 使用密码重置安全机制的详细信息，请参阅属性。For more information on using password-reset security, see the property. ## Active Directory 连接Active Directory connections 当类用于连接到 Active Directory 或 Active Directory 应用程序模式 (ADAM) 服务器上，`connectionProtection`使用设置的属性[将元素添加为成员资格 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18)在应用程序配置文件可能会限制的操作类型类可通过连接执行。When the class is used to connect to an Active Directory or an Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) server, the `connectionProtection` attribute that is set using the [add Element for providers for membership (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18) in the application configuration file may restrict the types of operations the class can perform over the connection. `connectionProtection`属性也确定方法实例将用于创建与 Active Directory 或 ADAM 服务器的连接。The `connectionProtection` attribute also determines the methods the instance will use to create the connection to the Active Directory or ADAM server. 下表显示的效果`connectionProtection`属性时连接到 Active Directory。The following table shows the effect of the `connectionProtection` attribute when connecting to an Active Directory. |`connectionProtection` 设置`connectionProtection` setting|效果Effect| |------------------------------------|------------| ||类将连接到 Active Directory，与这些限制。The class will connect to an Active Directory, with these restrictions.

的设置密码任何方法将失败。- Any method that sets a password will fail. Active Directory 要求安全连接时更改密码。Active Directory requires a secure connection when changing passwords.
-您必须显式设置`connectionUsername`和`connectionPassword`属性使用[将元素添加为成员资格 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18)中应用程序配置文件; 否则为实例则会引发异常。- You must explicitly set the `connectionUsername` and `connectionPassword` attributes using the [add Element for providers for membership (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18) in the application configuration file; otherwise, the instance will throw a exception.| |`Secure`|类将尝试连接到使用 SSL 的 Active Directory。The class will attempt to connect to Active Directory using SSL. 如果 SSL 失败，则将进行第二个尝试连接到 Active Directory 使用签名-密封。If SSL fails, a second attempt to connect to Active Directory using sign-and-seal will be made. 如果这两个尝试都失败，实例则会引发异常。If both attempts fail, the instance will throw a exception.

支持进程凭据和显式凭据。Both process credentials and explicit credentials are supported.| 下表显示的效果`connectionProtection`属性连接到 ADAM 服务器时。The following table shows the effect of the `connectionProtection` attribute when connecting to an ADAM server. |`connectionProtection` 设置`connectionProtection` setting|效果Effect| |------------------------------------|------------| ||类将连接到一个具有此限制的 ADAM 服务器。The class will connect to an ADAM server, with this restriction.

的设置密码任何方法将失败，除非您显式配置 ADAM 服务器，以便能够发送并更改通过不安全连接的密码的服务器。- Any method that sets passwords will fail unless you explicitly configure the ADAM server to allow passwords to be sent and changed over an insecure connection.

支持进程凭据和显式凭据。Both process credentials and explicit credentials are supported.| |`Secure`|类将尝试连接到使用 SSL 的 ADAM 服务器。The class will attempt to connect to the ADAM server using SSL. 如果无法建立连接，实例则会引发异常。If a connection cannot be made, the instance will throw a exception.

支持进程凭据和显式凭据。Both process credentials and explicit credentials are supported.| ## ADAM 配置ADAM Configuration 使用 ADAM 服务器时，ADAM 实例必须包含定义的架构`User`类。When using an ADAM server, the ADAM instance must contain a schema that defines the `User` class. 你可以导入`User`LDIF 导入类`MS-User.ldf`文件 ADAM 安装目录中可用。You can import the `User` class with an LDIF import of the `MS-User.ldf` file available in the ADAM install directory. 类会使用 ADAM 服务器配置为使用默认网络端口。The class will work with an ADAM server configured to use the default network ports. 下表显示的默认 ADAM 服务器所预期的值。The following table shows the defaults expected for the ADAM server. |connectionProtection 设置connectionProtection setting|预期的 ADAM 端口Expected ADAM port| |----------------------------------|------------------------| ||389389| |`Secure`|636636| 如果你的 ADAM 服务器未使用的默认端口，请参阅文章 Q817583，"Active Directory 服务不要求安全授权通过 SSL 连接，"在[Microsoft 知识库文章](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37115)。If your ADAM server is not using the default ports, see article Q817583, "Active Directory Services does not request secure authorization over an SSL connection," in the [Microsoft Knowledge Base](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37115). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示配置为使用 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件实例。The following code examples show the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application configured to use an instance. 第一个示例对于 Active Directory 属性，使用默认映射，并不支持密码重置安全问题答案，也不调用搜索方法的能力。The first example uses the default mappings for Active Directory attributes, and does not support password-reset security with question-and-answer nor the ability to call search methods. 第二个示例显示允许的所有属性设置实例。The second example shows all the attribute settings allowed for an instance. 第一个示例是使用 Active Directory 属性的默认映射的简单配置文件。The first example is a simple configuration file using default mappings for Active Directory attributes. ``` ``` 此示例将显示所有可用的实例的属性设置。This example shows all of the attribute settings that are available for an instance of . ``` /> ``` `clientSearchTimeout` 和`serverSearchTimeout`到几分钟的默认值。`clientSearchTimeout` and `serverSearchTimeout` default to minutes. 若要更改单位，设置`timeoutUnit`属性值设为"Days"、"Hours"、"分钟数"、"Seconds"或"毫秒"之一。To change the units, set the `timeoutUnit` attribute value to one of "Days", "Hours", "Minutes", "Seconds", or "Milliseconds". 如果未指定的属性，则默认值为"分钟数"。If the attribute is not specified, the default is "Minutes".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以设置为 ASP.NET 应用程序的名称; 但是，应用程序名称不由类。The property can be set to the name of the ASP.NET application; however, the application name is not used by the class. 因此，与其他不同实现交互操作，访问相同的 Active Directory 数据存储区始终将共享相同的用户数据的所有 ASP.NET 应用程序。Therefore, unlike other implementations, all ASP.NET applications that access the same Active Directory data store will always share the same user data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于更新 Active Directory 数据存储区中的用户的密码。The method is used to update the user's password in the Active Directory data store. 而不考虑凭据，实例配置为使用，提供程序连接到 Active Directory 服务器使用`username`和`oldPassword`连接凭据作为参数。Regardless of the credentials that the instance is configured to use, the provider connects to the Active Directory server using the `username` and `oldPassword` parameters as the connection credentials. 如果属性是`true`、 用户不能更改他或她如果因为用户太多，所以以前锁定帐户的密码尝试回答密码提示问题。If the property is `true`, the user cannot change his or her password if the account was previously locked because the user made too many attempts to answer the password question. 用户将需要等待中指定的分钟数更改密码之前的属性。The user will need to wait the number of minutes specified in the property before changing the password. 如果密码更改成功和属性是`true`，然后用户的密码不正确答案跟踪计数器将重置。If the password change succeeds and the property is `true`, then the user's bad password answer tracking counters are reset. 提供程序查找要通过执行开始连接字符串中指定的搜索点的用户名称的子树搜索更新的用户实例。The provider finds the user instance to update by performing a subtree search for the user name starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 请参阅有关连接字符串的详细信息的类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 若要更改 Active Directory 服务器上的密码`connectionProtection`属性必须设置为。To change passwords on an Active Directory server the `connectionProtection` attribute must be set to . 如果使用 ADAM 服务器，`connectionProtection`属性可以设置为，但仅当显式配置 ADAM 服务器以允许通过不安全的连接进行密码更改。When using an ADAM server, the `connectionProtection` attribute can be set to , but only if you explicitly configure the ADAM server to allow password change over unsecured connections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用该方法类来更新密码提示问题和答案 Active Directory 成员资格存储区中的用户。The method is called by the class to update the password question and answer for a user in the Active Directory membership store. 在重置用户的密码时，需要密码提示问题和答案提供额外的安全层。Requiring a password question and answer provides an additional layer of security when resetting a user's password. 在创建时的用户名称，用户可以提供的问题和答案，以后可用于重置忘记了的密码。When creating a user name, a user can supply a question and answer that can later be used to reset a forgotten password. 方法更新密码提示问题和成员资格用户的答案，为新值。The method updates the password question and answer for a membership user to new values. 若要使用方法，你必须在你的应用程序配置文件中设置这些附加属性：In order to use the method, you must set these additional attributes in your application's configuration file: - `requiresQuestionAndAnswer` 必须是 `true.``requiresQuestionAndAnswer` must be `true.` - `attributeMapPasswordQuestion` 和`attributeMapPasswordAnswer`必须映射到 Active Directory 架构中的属性。`attributeMapPasswordQuestion` and `attributeMapPasswordAnswer` must be mapped to attributes in the Active Directory schema. 如果不满足上述条件，在初始化时引发。If the above criteria are not met, a is thrown at initialization. 实例连接到 Active Directory 数据存储区中提供的凭据与`username`和`password`参数来验证用户名/密码组合。The instance connects to the Active Directory data store with the credentials provided in the `username` and `password` parameters to validate the user name/password combination. 问题和答案的实际更新提供程序的配置的连接凭据执行。The actual update of the question and answer is performed with the configured connection credentials of the provider. 如果不正确的密码提供给方法，目录服务器将递增跟踪无效的密码尝试的计数器。If an incorrect password is supplied to the method, the directory server will increment the counters that track invalid password attempts. 这可能会导致用户被锁定，无法登录之前清除锁定状态是通过调用方法或经过目录中指定的锁定持续时间。This can result in the user being locked and unable to log on until either the lock status is cleared by a call to the method or the locked duration specified in the directory passes. 如果对问题和答案的更新成功和属性是`true`，跟踪用户的错误的密码提示问题答案计数器将重置。If the update to the question and answer succeeds and the property is `true`, the user's bad password answer tracking counters are reset. 使用加密密码提示问题答案方法之前存储在 Active Directory 数据存储区。The password answer is encrypted using the method before it is stored in the Active Directory data store. 通过指定的加密密钥和算法[machineKey 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46)配置元素。The encryption key and algorithm are specified by the [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46) configuration element. 上的解密属性[machineKey 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46)必须指定元素，类不支持自动生成加密密钥。The decryption attribute on the [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46) element must be specified, the class does not support auto-generated encryption keys. 密码提示问题的最大长度为 256 个字符。The maximum length for the password question is 256 characters. 密码提示问题答案的最大长度为 128 个字符。The maximum length for the password answer is 128 characters. 除外的所有参数值中裁剪掉前导空格和尾随空格`password`。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values except for `password`. 提供程序查找要通过执行开始连接字符串中指定的搜索点的用户名称的子树搜索更新的用户实例。The provider finds the user instance to update by performing a subtree search for the user name starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 请参阅有关连接字符串的详细信息的类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类在 Active Directory 数据存储区中创建新用户。The method is called by the class to create a new user in the Active Directory data store. 对于 Active Directory 和 Active Directory 应用程序模式 (ADAM) 服务器，类需要将目录中的实例类`user`。For both Active Directory and Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) servers, the class requires that the instance class in the directory be `user`. 可选用户类，如`inetOrgPerson`不支持。Alternative user classes such as `inetOrgPerson` are not supported. 当使用 Active Directory 服务器和用户名称映射到`userPrincipalName`属性，类自动生成的随机 20 个字符的用户名称`sAMAccountName`代表你的参数。When using an Active Directory server and the user name is mapped to the `userPrincipalName` attribute, the class will automatically generate a random 20-character user name for the `sAMAccountName` parameter on your behalf. 参数默认为最大长度如下。Parameters default to the following maximum lengths. |参数Parameter|最大长度Maximum length| |---------------|--------------------| |`username`|如果使用的 64 个字符`userPrincipalName`属性。64 characters if using the `userPrincipalName` attribute. 如果使用`sAMAccountName`属性，则通常限制为 20 个字符或更少。If using the `sAMAccountName` attribute, the common restriction is 20 characters or less.| |`password`|128 个字符。128 characters.| |`email`|256 个字符。256 characters.| |`passwordQuestion`|256 个字符。256 characters.| |`passwordAnswer`|之前和之后加密 128 个字符。128 characters before and after encrypting.| 属性对返回实例被限制为 1024年个字符。The property on the returned instance is limited to 1024 characters. 如果已通过减少这些属性的最大允许长度修改目录架构，这些长度将优先。If the directory schema has been modified by reducing the maximum allowable lengths for these attributes, these lengths will take precedence. 在创建用户之前,类将确保用户名称是唯一的。Before creating the user, the class will make sure the user name is unique. 如果实例配置为需要唯一的电子邮件地址，它还将确保电子邮件地址是唯一的。If the instance is configured to require unique email addresses, it will also make sure the email address is unique. 在 Active Directory 用户名称的唯一性将强制执行通过执行时的用户名称映射到 GC 搜索`userPrincipalName`。In an Active Directory user-name uniqueness is enforced by performing a GC search when the user name is mapped to `userPrincipalName`. 如果`sAMAccountName`使用，则目录将自动强制实施的唯一性`sAMAccountName`跨 Active Directory 域。If `sAMAccountName` is used, then the directory will automatically enforce uniqueness of the `sAMAccountName` across the Active Directory domain. ADAM 服务器将自动强制实施的用户名称的唯一性`userPrincipalName`跨所有应用程序分区。An ADAM server will automatically enforce user name uniqueness of the `userPrincipalName` across all application partitions. 通过执行从在其中创建用户的容器的根目录开始的重复电子邮件地址的子树搜索强制唯一性的电子邮件地址。Uniqueness of the email address is enforced by performing a subtree search for a duplicate email address starting at the root of the container in which users are created. 这是默认用户容器 （连接字符串中指定如果连接到 Active Directory 和非容器） 或连接字符串中指定的容器。This is either the default user container (if connected to an Active Directory and no container was specified in the connection string) or the container specified in the connection string. 类直接在连接字符串中指定的用户容器中创建用户。The class creates the user directly in the user container specified in the connection string. 请参阅有关连接字符串的详细信息的类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 在 Active Directory 服务器上，设置密码`connectionProtection`属性必须设置为。For passwords to be set on an Active Directory server, the `connectionProtection` attribute must be set to . 当使用 ADAM 服务器时，`connectionProtection`属性可以设置为，但仅当你显式配置 ADAM 服务器，以便通过不安全连接的密码更改的服务器。When an ADAM server is being used, the `connectionProtection` attribute can be set to , but only if you explicitly configure the ADAM server to allow password changes over unsecured connections. 除之外的所有字符串参数值中裁剪掉前导空格和尾随空格`password`。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all string parameter values except `password`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非用来连接到 Active Directory 服务器的凭据拥有域管理员权限 （不推荐） 或"创建子实例"，无法创建新用户"删除子实例"和"设置密码"访问权限。You cannot create new users unless the credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "create child instance," "delete child instance," and "set password" access rights. "删除子实例"访问权限是必需的因为创建用户是一个多步骤过程，并且如果用户创建的任何步骤失败，类将删除该用户实例而不保留中的部分构造完整的用户实例目录。The "delete child instance" access right is required because creating a user is a multi-step process, and if any step of user creation fails, the class will delete the user instance rather than leave a partially constructed user instance in the directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示当前的安全级别，实例配置为使用。The property indicates the current level of security that the instance is configured to use. 属性基于`connnectionProtection`属性设置与[将元素添加为成员资格 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18)应用程序配置文件中。The property is based on the `connnectionProtection` attribute set with the [add Element for providers for membership (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18) in the application configuration file. `connectionProtection`属性只能设置为或配置文件中。The `connectionProtection` attribute can only be set to or in the configuration file. 请参阅有关连接字符串的详细信息的类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示配置 Web.config 条目要使用的 SSL 安全协议连接到 Active Directory 服务器实例。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to use the SSL security protocol to connect to an Active Directory server. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以立即删除标识的用户`username`参数。The method immediately removes the user identified by the `username` parameter. 由于 Active Directory 数据存储在单独的目录的区域中不存储用户信息`deleteAllRelatedData`参数将被忽略，尽管它必须设置为`true`或`false`调用时方法。Since the Active Directory data store does not store user information in separate areas of the directory, the `deleteAllRelatedData` parameter is ignored, although it must be set to either `true` or `false` when calling the method. 类查找要删除通过由连接字符串的用户容器中执行搜索的用户名单级别的用户实例。The class finds the user instance to delete by performing a single-level search for the user name in the users container determined by the connection string. 请参阅有关连接字符串的详细信息的类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. `username` 必须是 64 个字符或更少。`username` must be 64 characters or less. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非用来连接到 Active Directory 服务器的凭据具有 （不推荐） 任一域管理员权限或"删除子实例"访问权限，无法删除用户。You cannot delete users unless the credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "delete child instances" access right.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否可以使用方法来重置用户的密码。The property indicates whether you can use the method to reset a user's password. 属性设置在应用程序的配置文件中使用`enablePasswordReset`属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `enablePasswordReset` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 仅可设置属性`true`时以下[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)进行了元素设置。You can only set the property `true` when the following [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element settings have been made. - `requiresQuestionAndAnswer` 必须是`true`。`requiresQuestionAndAnswer` must be `true`. - 必须修改 Active Directory 架构以包含用于存储的密码提示问题和答案，以及密码提示问题答案更改尝试的三个跟踪字段的特性。The Active Directory schema must be modified to contain attributes for storing the password question and answer, as well as the three tracking fields for password-answer change attempts. - `attributeMapPasswordQuestion``attributeMapPasswordAnswer`， `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`， `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`，和`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime`必须映射到 Active Directory 架构中的属性。`attributeMapPasswordQuestion`, `attributeMapPasswordAnswer`, `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`, `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`, and `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` must be mapped to attributes in the Active Directory schema. 如果不满足上述条件，在初始化时引发。If the above criteria are not met, a is thrown at initialization. 当应用程序配置文件中的连接字符串指定的 Active Directory 域而不是特定的服务器，实例将始终连接到包含要确保的域的 PDC 角色的域控制器密码更改生效，并且可用调用方法。When the connection string in the application configuration file specifies an Active Directory domain rather than a specific server, the instance will always connect to the domain controller that has the PDC role for the domain to ensure that password changes take effect and are available when the method is called. > [!NOTE] > 即使属性是`true`，除非用于连接到 Active Directory 服务器的凭据具有域管理员权限 （不推荐） 或的"重置密码"访问权限，你无法重置用户密码。Even if the property is `true`, you cannot reset user passwords unless the credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "reset password" access right. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示配置 Web.config 条目实例启用密码重置。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to enable password resets. 它使用显式凭据的用户给出的"重置密码"访问权限。It uses the explicit credentials of a user given the "reset password" access right. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当将用户凭据放在 Web.config 文件中时，有潜在的安全威胁。When you place user credentials in your Web.config file, there are potential security threats. 对包含 Web.config 文件的目录具有访问权限的用户可以读取该文件，并因此查看这些凭据。Users with access rights to the directory containing the Web.config file can read the file, and thus see the credentials. 有关如何防范此威胁的详细信息，请参阅[加密配置信息使用受保护的配置](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For details on how to protect against this threat, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1). ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜索 Active Directory 服务器可能是占用大量资源，因为属性使您能够将关闭搜索面向方法。Because searching an Active Directory server is potentially resource intensive, the property enables you to turn off search-oriented methods. 属性设置在应用程序的配置文件中使用`enableSearchMethods`属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `enableSearchMethods` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 当属性是`false`，以下方法不可用：When the property is `false`, the following methods are not available: - - - 提供程序使用连接字符串中指定的搜索点启动的子树搜索。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 请参阅有关连接字符串的详细信息的类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 我们建议你不要启用搜索在生产系统上，直到您已确认的搜索查询签发类不会产生负面影响你的目录服务器的性能。We recommend that you do not enable searching on production systems until you have confirmed that the search queries issued by the class do not adversely impact your directory server's performance. 由于类旨在用于无状态 Web 环境，则你无法使用公开基础的分页优化Api。Since the class is designed for a stateless Web environment, it is unable to use the paging optimizations exposed by the underlying APIs. 这意味着分页操作期间对较大目录搜索时非常贵，应当避免。This means that paging operations during searches against large directories are very expensive and should be avoided. 搜索操作始终发出针对配置连接字符串中的目录服务器或在连接字符串指向域的情况下自动选择的服务器中。Search operations are always issued against the directory server configured in the connection string, or an automatically selected server in the case of a connection string pointing at a domain. 用于其搜索方法，该提供程序不使用全局编录。The provider does not use a global catalog for its search methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示配置 Web.config 条目若要启用搜索 Active Directory 服务器的实例。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to enable searching an Active Directory server. ``` ```

类将颁发同时使用搜索`clientSearchTimeout`和`serverSearchTimeout`配置值。The class will issue the search using both the `clientSearchTimeout` and `serverSearchTimeout` configuration values. 由于类执行针对使用 512 行每页的页的目录服务器的搜索、 超时值应用到每一页结果通过提取类。Since the class performs searches against the directory server using pages with 512 rows per page, the time-outs apply to each page of results fetched by the class. 例如，如果搜索查询结果中的数据，1,000 行类将提取该信息作为两个数据页。For example, if a search query results in 1,000 rows of data, the class will fetch this information as two pages of data. 这意味着客户端和搜索超时将开始计数从零在类请求数据的第二页。This means that the client and search time-outs will start counting from zero when the class requests the second page of data. 返回的结果方法受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。The results returned by the method are constrained parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of matching membership users found in the Active Directory data store. 例如，如果有 13 个用户配置的数据存储中，与`pageIndex`值为 1，`pageSize`为 5，返回将包含到 10 个用户的第六个。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured data store, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth users. `totalRecords`参数将设置为 13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. 您可以控制是否允许用户，通过设置搜索属性在应用程序的配置文件中使用`enableSearchMethods`属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 环境，则你无法使用公开基础的分页优化Api。Since the class is designed for a stateless Web environment, it is unable to use the paging optimizations exposed by the underlying APIs. 这意味着分页操作期间对较大目录搜索时非常贵，应当避免。This means that paging operations during searches against large directories are very expensive and should be avoided. 搜索操作始终发出针对配置连接字符串中的目录服务器或在连接字符串指向域的情况下自动选择的服务器中。Search operations are always issued against remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法类调用方法类检索一个随机密码。The method of the class calls the method of the class to retrieve a random password. 密码长度设置为值属性。The password length is set to the value of the property. 密码长度不能小于 14。The password length can never be less than 14. 你可以明确调用方法通过引用直接从提供程序属性的类类。You can specifically call the method by referencing the class directly from the Provider property of the class. 生成的密码仅包含字母数字字符和以下标点符号: ！ @# $%^ & \* （） _-+ = [{}]};: <>|。 /？。The generated password only contains alphanumeric characters and the following punctuation marks: !@#$%^&\*()_-+=[{]};:<>|./?. 生成的密码中包含没有隐藏或非可打印的控制字符。No hidden or non-printable control characters are included in the generated password. 生成的密码将包含至少中指定的非字母数字字符数属性。The generated password will contain at least the number of non-alphanumeric characters specified in the property. 生成的密码不到测试中的正则表达式属性。The generated password will not be tested with the regular expression in the property. > [!NOTE] > 类不会生成匹配的目录中设置的复杂性要求的密码。The class does not generate passwords that match complexity requirements set in the directory. 就可以生成失败设置目录的密码复杂性规则的随机密码。It is possible to generate a random password that fails the password complexity rules set by the directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法类从 Active Directory 数据存储检索的用户名称基于用户的电子邮件地址。This method is called by the class to retrieve a user name from the Active Directory data store based on the email address for the user. 如果成员资格数据存储区中的多个用户具有相同的电子邮件地址，则返回遇到的第一个用户名。If more than one user in the membership data store has the same email address, the first user name encountered is returned. 你可以设置`requiresUniqueEmail`属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素`true`在应用程序配置文件，以确保每封电子邮件地址在数据库中的是唯一的。You can set the `requiresUniqueEmail` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element to `true` in the application configuration file to ensure that each email address in the database is unique. 删除 `email` 参数值的前导和尾随空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from the `email` parameter value. 如果修整后, 的电子邮件地址为空引发。If the email address is empty after trimming, an is thrown. 如果电子邮件地址为`null`，搜索 Active Directory 数据存储区中的所有用户名称，并返回第一个用户名。If the email address is `null`, all user names in the Active Directory data store are searched, and the first user name is returned. 我们建议你不要启用搜索在生产系统上，直到您已确认的搜索查询签发类不会产生负面影响你的目录服务器的性能。We recommend that you do not enable searching on production systems until you have confirmed that the search queries issued by the class do not adversely impact your directory server's performance. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法将运行，即使属性是`false`。The method will run even when the property is `false`. 由于类旨在用于无状态 Web 环境，则你无法使用公开基础的分页优化Api。Since the class is designed for a stateless Web environment, it is unable to use the paging optimizations exposed by the underlying APIs. 这意味着分页操作期间对较大目录搜索时非常贵，应当避免。This means that paging operations during searches against large directories are very expensive and should be avoided. 搜索操作始终发出针对配置连接字符串中的目录服务器或在连接字符串指向域的情况下自动选择的服务器中。Search operations are always issued against the directory server configured in the connection string, or an automatically selected server in the case of a connection string pointing at a domain. 用于其搜索方法，该提供程序不使用全局编录。The provider does not use a global catalog for its search methods. 提供程序使用连接字符串中指定的搜索点启动的子树搜索。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 请参阅有关连接字符串的详细信息的类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings.

.property instance int32 MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts As Integer
public: virtual property int MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取用户回答密码重置问题时允许失败的次数。

span.span: Gets the number of failed answer attempts a user is allowed for the password-reset question.

value.span: 在帐户被锁定之前，允许用户回答密码提示问题的失败次数。

span.span: The number of failed password answer attempts a user is allowed before the account is locked.

value.span: 默认值是5。

span.span: The default is 5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`true`，用户必须回答密码提示问题以重置他或她的密码。When the property is `true`, the user must answer the password question to reset his or her password. 用户通过建立的时间范围内允许有限的数量的提示问题答案尝试属性。The user is allowed a limited number of answer attempts within the time window established by the property. 如果密码提示问题答案尝试数大于或等于中存储的值属性，用户锁定的分钟数存储在以后尝试属性。If the number of password answer attempts is greater than or equal to the value stored in the property, the user is locked out of further attempts for the number of minutes stored in the property. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不控制用户能够进行锁定前的失败的登录尝试次数。Active Directory 服务器句柄失败登录尝试，不受此属性的值。This property does not control the number of failed logon attempts a user can make before being locked out. The Active Directory server handles failed logon attempts and is not affected by the value of this property. 属性设置在应用程序的配置文件中使用`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 如果在应用程序的配置文件中，未设置的属性属性设置的默认值为`5`。If the property is not set in the application's configuration file, the property is set to the default value of `5`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示配置 Web.config 条目实例锁定生成三个失败的用户尝试在 10 分钟的时间窗口中输入的密码答案。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to lock out users who make three failed attempts to enter the password answer in a 10-minute time window. 如果用户被锁定，没有任何进一步在负载测试时回答密码提示问题的尝试可能会进行 15 分钟。If the user is locked out, no further attempts to answer the password question may be made for 15 minutes. ``` ```

exception.span: 在初始化 实例之前，已尝试访问 属性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的最小创建有效密码时必须输入的特殊、 非字母数字字符数。The property returns the minimum number of special, non-alphanumeric characters that must be entered to create a valid password. 在该应用程序配置中设置了属性值`minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters`属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)配置元素。The property value is set in the application configuration using the `minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. 非字母数字字符是为其字符方法返回`false`。A non-alphanumeric character is a character for which the method returns `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的配置元素`system.web`的应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它指定应用程序使用的实例类以提供成员资格服务，并设置`minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters`属性设为一个字符。It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services, and sets the `minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters` attribute to one character. ``` ```

summary.span: 获取用户多次未能正确回答密码提示问题后用户帐户的锁定时间长度。

span.span: Get the length of time for which a user account is locked out after the user makes too many bad password-answer attempts.

value.span: 用户多次提供错误的密码提示问题答案后的锁定时间（以分钟为单位）。

span.span: The time, in minutes, that a user is locked out after providing too many incorrect password answers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`true`，用户必须回答密码提示问题以重置他或她的密码。When the property is `true`, the user must answer the password question to reset his or her password. 如果用户无法提供正确答案连续的次数等于观察指定的时间段内的属性值属性，用户不能进一步进行尝试锁定的分钟数中包含属性。If the user fails to supply the correct answer a consecutive number of times equal to the property value within the observation time period specified by the property, the user is locked out of further attempts for the number of minutes contained in the property. > [!NOTE] > 此属性未设置用户无法输入有效的密码后的锁定的持续时间。This property does not set the duration a user is locked out after failing to enter a valid password. Active Directory 服务器句柄失败登录尝试，不受此属性的值。The Active Directory server handles failed logon attempts and is not affected by the value of this property. 我们建议，属性设置为相同的值为许多失败登录尝试在 Active Directory 配置为指定的帐户锁定持续时间。We recommend that the property be set to the same value as the account lockout duration specified for too many failed logon attempts in the Active Directory configuration. 这将显示用户而不考虑是否被锁定由于尝试登录失败或错误的密码提示问题答案的一致的自动锁定行为。This will present consistent auto-lockout behavior for users regardless of whether they were locked out due to failed logon attempts or to bad password answers. 属性设置在应用程序的配置文件中使用`passwordAnswerAttemptLockoutDuration`属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `passwordAnswerAttemptLockoutDuration` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 如果在应用程序的配置文件中，未设置的属性属性设置为默认值为 30 分钟。If the property is not set in the application's configuration file, the property is set to the default value of 30 minutes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示配置 Web.config 条目实例锁定生成三个失败的用户尝试在 10 分钟的时间窗口中输入的密码答案。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to lock out users who make three failed attempts to enter the password answer in a 10-minute time window. 如果用户被锁定，没有任何进一步在负载测试时回答密码提示问题的尝试可能会进行 15 分钟。If the user is locked out, no further attempts to answer the password question may be made for 15 minutes. ``` ```

summary.span: 获取时间长度，在该时间间隔内对提供有效密码或密码答案的连续失败尝试次数进行跟踪。

span.span: Gets the time window during which consecutive failed attempts to provide a valid password or a valid password answer are tracked.

value.span: 对未能提供有效密码或密码答案的连续尝试次数进行跟踪的时间长度（以分钟为单位）。

span.span: The time window, in minutes, during which consecutive failed attempts to provide a valid password or a valid password answer are tracked.

value.span: 默认值为 10 分钟。

span.span: The default is 10 minutes.

value.span: 如果两次失败尝试之间的间隔大于 属性设置，则 实例将每次失败尝试都视为第一次失败尝试。

span.span: If the interval between each failed attempt is greater than the property setting, the instance treats each failed attempt as if it were the first failed attempt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性与结合工作属性，以帮助防止不需要的源猜测的密码或密码提示问题答案的成员资格用户通过反复尝试。The property works in conjunction with the property to help guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 当用户尝试登录，更改其密码或重置其密码时，在指定的时间窗口内只允许一定数量的连续尝试次数。When users are attempting to log in, change their password, or reset their password, only a certain number of consecutive attempts are allowed within a specified time window. 通过指定的时间范围的长度属性，它标识的无效尝试之间所允许的分钟数。The length of the time window is specified by the property, which identifies the number of minutes allowed between invalid attempts. 如果的连续失败次数尝试用户重置他或她的密码等于中存储的值属性，且时间自以来所经过最后一次的无效尝试为指定的分钟数小于属性，则用户帐户 s 锁定中包含的分钟数属性。If the number of consecutive failed attempts a user makes to reset his or her password equals the value stored in the property, and the time elapsed since the last invalid attempt is less than the number of minutes specified for the property, then the user account s locked out for the number of minutes contained in the property. 如果当前的失败的尝试和最后一次失败的尝试之间的间隔大于属性设置，当前的无效尝试计为第一次尝试。If the interval between the current failed attempt and the last failed attempt is greater than the property setting, the current invalid attempt is counted as the first attempt. 如果在达到最大允许的无效尝试次数之前提供有效的密码提示问题答案，则，设置的无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数的计数为零。If a valid password answer is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password-answer attempts is set to zero. 如果之前所允许的最大数量无效提供一个有效的密码，则尝试达到的无效密码尝试次数的计数和的无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数的计数设置为零。If a valid password is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password attempts and the count of invalid password-answer attempts are set to zero. 我们建议，属性设置为相同的值为帐户锁定持续时间指定最大的失败登录尝试次数 Active Directory 配置中。We recommend that the property be set to the same value as the account lockout duration that is specified for the maximum number of failed logon attempts in the Active Directory configuration. 是否由于尝试登录失败或错误的密码提示问题答案被锁定，这将显示用户的一致的自动锁定行为。This will present consistent auto-lockout behavior for users whether they were locked out due to failed logon attempts or to bad password answers. 属性设置在应用程序的配置文件中使用`passwordAttemptWindow`属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `passwordAttemptWindow` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 如果在应用程序的配置文件中，未设置的属性属性设置为 10 分钟的默认值。If the property is not set in the application's configuration file, the property is set to the default value of 10 minutes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示配置 Web.config 条目实例锁定生成三个失败的用户尝试在 10 分钟的时间窗口中输入的密码答案。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to lock out users who make three failed attempts to enter the password answer in a 10-minute time window. 如果用户被锁定，没有任何进一步在负载测试时回答密码提示问题的尝试可能会进行 15 分钟。If the user is locked out, no further attempts to answer the password question may be made for 15 minutes. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取用于计算密码复杂性的正则表达式。The property gets the regular expression used to evaluate password complexity. 属性不用于验证中的自动生成密码方法。The property is not used to validate auto-generated passwords in the method. 属性设置在应用程序配置中使用`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)配置元素。The property is set in the application configuration using the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的配置元素`system.web`的应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它指定应用程序使用的实例类以提供成员资格服务和集`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`属性设为正则表达式验证密码是否满足以下条件：It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services and sets the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute to a regular expression that validates that the password meets the following criteria: - 大于七个字符。Is greater than seven characters. - 包含至少一个数字。Contains at least one digit. - 包含至少一个特殊的 （非字母数字） 字符。Contains at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 如果密码不满足这些条件，密码不接受的成员资格提供程序。If the password does not meet these criteria, the password is not accepted by the membership provider. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置在应用程序的配置文件中使用`requiresQuestionAndAnswer`属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `requiresQuestionAndAnswer` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 如果在应用程序的配置文件中，未设置的属性属性设置的默认值为`false`。If the property is not set in the application's configuration file, the property is set to the default value of `false`. 当`requiresQuestionAndAnswer`属性设置为`true`，还必须设置这些附加属性。When the `requiresQuestionAndAnswer` attribute is set to `true`, you must also set these additional attributes. - `attributeMapPasswordQuestion` 和`attributeMapPasswordAnswer`必须映射到 Active Directory 架构中的属性。`attributeMapPasswordQuestion` and `attributeMapPasswordAnswer` must be mapped to attributes in the Active Directory schema. 如果不满足上述条件，在初始化时引发。If the above criteria are not met, a is thrown at initialization. > [!NOTE] > 您可以创建用户时, 需要密码提示问题和答案，但设置属性`false`以防止用户更改其密码使用类。You can require a password question and answer when creating a user, but set the property to `false` to prevent users from changing their passwords using the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示配置 Web.config 条目实例启用密码重置。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to enable password resets. 它使用显式凭据的用户给出的"重置密码"访问权限。It uses the explicit credentials of a user given the "reset password" access right. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当将用户凭据放在 Web.config 文件中时，有潜在的安全威胁。When you place user credentials in your Web.config file, there are potential security threats. 对包含 Web.config 文件的目录具有访问权限的用户可以读取该文件，并因此查看这些凭据。Users with access rights to the directory containing the Web.config file can read the file, and thus see the credentials. 有关如何防范此威胁的详细信息，请参阅[加密配置信息使用受保护的配置](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For details on how to protect against this threat, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1). ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用该方法类以将 Active Directory 数据存储区中的用户的密码重置为新随机生成的值。The method is called by the class to reset the password for a user in the Active Directory data store to a new randomly generated value. 返回新的密码。The new password is returned. > [!NOTE] > 通过创建随机密码方法不能保证传递中的正则表达式属性。The random password created by the method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the property. 但是，随机的密码将满足条件由建立和属性。However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the and properties. 如果要为提供不正确答案方法时，内部计数器跟踪无效密码提示问题答案尝试就会递增 1。If an incorrect answer is supplied to the method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password-answer attempts is incremented by one. 这可能会导致用户无法登录，直到通过调用清除锁定状态方法。This can result in the user being unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the method. 如果提供正确的密码提示问题答案，并且用户当前未被锁定，则跟踪无效的密码尝试次数的内部计数器重置为零。If the correct password answer is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counter that tracks invalid password attempts is reset to zero. 有关详细信息，请参阅和属性。For more information, see the and properties. 删除所有参数值的前导和尾随空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. 你可以调用直接通过第一个获取对引用的方法实例从属性。You can call the method directly by first obtaining a reference to the instance from the property. 提供程序使用连接字符串中指定的搜索点启动的子树搜索。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 请参阅有关连接字符串的详细信息的类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 若要在 Active Directory 服务器上，设置密码`connectionProtection`属性必须设置为。To set passwords on an Active Directory server, the `connectionProtection` attribute must be set to . 如果使用 ADAM 服务器，`connectionProtection`属性可以设置为，但仅当你显式配置 ADAM 服务器，以便通过不安全连接的密码更改的服务器。When using an ADAM server, the `connectionProtection` attribute can be set to , but only if you explicitly configure the ADAM server to allow password changes over unsecured connections. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非用来连接到 Active Directory 服务器的凭据具有域管理员权限 （不推荐） 或的"重置密码"访问权限，无法重置密码。You cannot reset passwords unless the credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "reset password" access right. 若要重置密码，必须满足所有以下条件：To reset a password, all of the following conditions must be true: - 属性必须设置为`true`。The property must be set to `true`. - 必须修改 Active Directory 架构以包含用于存储的密码提示问题和答案，属性和密码的三个跟踪字段回答更改。The Active Directory schema must be modified to contain attributes for storing the password question and answer, and the three tracking fields for password answer changes. - `attributeMapPasswordQuestion`， `attributeMapPasswordAnswer`， `attributMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`， `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`，和`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockedTime`必须在应用程序配置文件中设置属性。The `attributeMapPasswordQuestion`, `attributeMapPasswordAnswer`, `attributMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`, `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`, and `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockedTime` attributes must be set in the application configuration file. - 属性必须设置为`true`。The property must be set to `true`. - 连接到 Active Directory 数据存储 （进程帐户或显式凭据） 的安全上下文必须具有足够的权限来更改密码。The security context for connecting to the Active Directory data store (either the process account or the explicit credentials) must have sufficient privileges to change passwords. 用于连接到 Active Directory 服务器的凭据具有域管理员权限 （不推荐） 或的"重置密码"访问权限。The credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "reset password" access right. > [!NOTE] > 在 Active Directory 服务器上设置安全策略可能使其不可能方法以生成密码符合策略。Security policies set on the Active Directory server may make it impossible for the method to generate a password that satisfies the policies. 默认实现方法将生成满足运行 Windows Server 2003 SP1 的域控制器上的默认密码策略的密码。The default implementation of the method will generate passwords that satisfy the default password policies on domain controllers running Windows Server 2003 SP1. 如果密码不能重置安全策略在 Active Directory 服务器上，由于引发。If the password cannot be reset due to security policies on the Active Directory server, a is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户通常情况下锁定，并且无法通过验证方法时中指定的时间内超过属性属性或者当尝试输入太多次已使用了错误的密码登录。Users are most commonly locked out and cannot be validated by the method when the property is exceeded within the time specified in the property or when too many attempts have been made to log on using the wrong password. 如果属性是`true`，当用户时的错误的密码被重置解锁计数器。If the property is `true`, when a user is unlocked the counters for bad passwords are reset. 提供程序使用连接字符串中指定的搜索点启动的子树搜索。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 请参阅有关连接字符串的详细信息的类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 删除 `username` 参数值的前导和尾随空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from the `username` parameter value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法类来验证针对 Active Directory 数据存储的用户凭据。This method is called by the class to validate user credentials against the Active Directory data store. 如果属性是`true`和提供的凭据有效，不正确的密码提示问题答案的用户的跟踪计数器将重置。If the property is `true` and the supplied credentials are valid, the user's tracking counters for bad password answers are reset. 方法可能返回`false`正确的凭据提供后，可以在下列情况下：The method may return `false` when the correct credentials are supplied, under the following circumstances: 1. 用户帐户被锁定的目录服务器由于失败的登录尝试次数太多。The user account was locked out by the directory server because of too many failed logon attempts. 用户将无法登录，直到目录的锁定时间结束为止。The user will not be able to log on until the directory's lockout duration passes. 2. 如果属性是`true`，如果用户提供错误的密码提示问题答案次数过多，则将锁定用户帐户。If the property is `true`, the user account will be locked if the user supplied a bad password answer too many times. 用户的帐户将在指定的时间后进行解锁属性已通过。The user's account will unlock after the time specified in the property has passed. 3. 用户必须在连接字符串中指定的容器中存在。The user must exist in the container specified in the connection string. 为位于一个不同的容器或不同域中的用户帐户提供有效的凭据。Valid credentials are supplied for a user account located in a different container or in a different domain. 用户必须在连接字符串中指定的容器中存在。The user must exist in the container specified in the connection string. 在验证用户时，提供程序通过连接到 Active Directory 数据存储区中使用指定的用户名和密码，不在应用程序配置文件中配置的凭据来验证凭据。When validating a user, the provider validates the credentials by connecting to the Active Directory data store using the specified user name and password, not the credentials configured in the application configuration file. 但是，实例将连接到下列原因造成使用配置的凭据的目录。However, the instance will connect to the directory using the configured credentials for the following reasons. - 若要确认用户存在内搜索范围所确定的那样实例的连接字符串。To confirm that a user exists within the search scope as determined by the instance's connection string. 提供程序使用连接字符串中指定的搜索点启动的子树搜索以确定用户是否存在。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string to determine whether a user exists. 用户必须存在于指定的容器。The user must exist in the specified container. 将不会验证之外的连接字符串指定的容器如果是有效的凭据。Credentials that are valid outside the connection string's specified container will not be validated. 请参阅有关连接字符串的详细信息的类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. - 如果属性是`true`、实例将使用配置的凭据以加载用户实例，以检查是否用户已锁定因为他或她所作的更改密码提示问题答案尝试次数过多失败.If the property is `true`, the instance will use the configured credentials to load the user instance to check whether the user has been locked out because he or she has made too many failed attempts to change the password answer. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用启用了"来宾"帐户连接到 Active Directory 域控制器是一个潜在的安全威胁。Connecting to an Active Directory domain controller with the "Guest" account enabled is a potential security threat. 具有启用"来宾"帐户在 Active Directory 域控制器上所做的所有验证尝试将会都成功。All validation attempts made on an Active Directory domain controller with the "Guest" account enabled will succeed. 若要使用 Active Directory 域控制器时，可提高安全性，应禁用在域控制器上的"来宾"帐户。To improve security when using an Active Directory domain controller, you should disable the "Guest" account on the domain controller. 实例将尝试根据 Active Directory 的并发绑定，当满足以下条件之一：The instance will attempt a concurrent bind against Active Directory when one of the following conditions is met: - 属性设置为 。The property is set to . - 属性设置为和选择 SSL实例保护连接的安全。The property is set to and SSL is chosen by the instance to secure the connection. 此外，进行并发绑定，以下条件必须为 true:In addition, for a concurrent bind to be made, the following conditions must be true: - 必须在 Windows Server 2003 上运行的目录服务器。The directory server must be running on Windows Server 2003. - 运行的 Web 服务器的操作系统实例必须支持并发绑定 (例如，Windows Server 2003)。The operating system of the Web server running the instance must support concurrent binds (for example, Windows Server 2003). 当使用并发绑定时，用户的最后登录日期未在目录中; 中更新因此，不能依赖属性。When a concurrent bind is used, the last logon date for the user is not updated in the directory; therefore, the property cannot be relied on. 删除前导和尾随空格`username`参数。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from the `username` parameter.
